title: Introduction to Automated Text Classification for MOOC Learner Experience Analysis

context.additional_context: Acquiring skills for mathematics domain professionals to efficiently analyze learner feedback on MOOC (Massive Open Online Course) platforms

learning_goals: Learner-generated text data can be automatically classified into five or more semantic categories.
One can explain the basic structure and learning principles of RCNN-based classification models
One can visualize learning experiences using text analysis tools in smartphone environments
One can propose at least three improvements for MOOC design based on analysis results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
